blogs.title: Cognizance Symposium
blogs.body: Hey champs, Here we are with a new Event. Computer science and engineering association has planned to conduct a inter-departmental symposium on march 3rd. There are 4 tech and 3 non tech events and some coding events too. No registration fee for the participants. Do participate and get some inputs.
blogs.author: Logesh

blogs.title: Rently Experience
blogs.body:
Hi all, I am Kapil and I am proud to inform that I got placed in Rently Software Solutions, I am here to share my Interview experience with you. There are 4 rounds in total 
 1.Coding round
2.General HR
3.Technical HR
4.Managemental Round
blogs.author: Kapil

blogs.title: Biweekly contect by CCC
blogs.body: Coding club of Computer science and engineering department has planned to conduct a biweekly coding contest on coming friday, Do participate in the event and win exciting cash prizes.
blogs.author: Kavin

blogs.title: Salon Booking Application
blogs.body: Hi! I am kishore, I have developed a salon booking web application used to book your slots to get groomed, give it a try and save your precious time.
blogs.author: Kishore
